title: BANDIT

description.plain:
“BANDIT” serves as the lead single of Don Toliver’s newly-envisioned fourth studio album, HARDSTONE PSYCHO. Over a pitched up Tame Impala sample, Don gives a vivid glimpse into his exotic lifestyle, comparable to that of bikers which inspired his clothing brand HARDSTONE.

The track was debuted at the Europe leg of his Love Sick tour in 2023, and subsequently previewed by live streamer N3ON on KICK.

The music video ends with Don revealing his fiancée Kali Uchis‘ pregnancy, simultaneously previewing the next single in promotion of HARDSTONE PSYCHO, “DEEP IN THE WATER.”

embed_content: Read “BANDIT” by Don Toliver on Genius

The track was debuted at the Europe leg of his Love Sick tour in 2023, and subsequently previewed by live streamer N3ON on KICK.

The music video ends with Don revealing his fiancée Kali Uchis‘ pregnancy, simultaneously previewing the next single in promotion of HARDSTONE PSYCHO, “DEEP IN THE WATER.”
